create.item_attributes.gear_transmog: is a gear piece that uses the "%1$s" model
create.item_attributes.gear_transmog.inv: is not a gear piece that uses the "%1$s" model
create.item_attributes.repair: is a gear piece with at least "%1$s" unused repair slots
create.item_attributes.repair.inverted: is not a gear piece with at least "%1$s" unused repair slots
create.item_attributes.level: is a gear item that's at least level "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.level.inverted: is not a gear item that's at least level "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.size: is a jewel with up to "%1$s" size
create.item_attributes.size.inverted: is not a jewel with up to "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.implicit: is a gear item that has an implicit that adds "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.implicit.inverted: is not a gear item that has an implicit that adds "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.prefix: is a gear item that has a prefix that adds "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.prefix.inverted: is not a gear item that has a prefix that adds "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.suffix: is a gear item that has a suffix that adds "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.suffix.inverted: is not a gear item that has a suffix that adds "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.has_legendary: is a gear item that has a legendary modifier
create.item_attributes.has_legendary.inv: is not a gear item that has a legendary modifier
create.item_attributes.is_unidentified.i: is not an unidentified gear item
create.item_attributes.legendary_prefix: is a gear item that has a legendary prefix that adds "%1$s"
is not a gear item that has a legendary prefix that adds "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.legendary_suffix: is a gear item that has a legendary prefix that adds "%1$s"
is not a gear item that has a legendary prefix that adds "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.inscription_room: is an inscription that adds a "%1$s" room
is not an inscription that adds a "%1$s" room
create.item_attributes.inscription_type: is an inscription that adds a "%1$s" type of room
is not an inscription that adds a "%1$s" type of room
create.item_attributes.inscription_time: is an inscription that adds at least "%1$s"
is not an inscription that adds at least "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.inscription_compl: is an inscription that adds at least "%1$s" completion
is not an inscription that adds at least "%1$s" completion
create.item_attributes.inscription_insta: is an inscription that adds up to "%1$s" instability
is not an inscription that adds up to "%1$s" instability
create.item_attributes.cut_count: is a jewel that has been free cut "%1$s" times
create.item_attributes.cut_count.inverte: is not a jewel that has been free cut "%1$s" times
create.item_attributes.charm_uses: is a charm with at least "%1$s" uses left
create.item_attributes.charm_uses.invert: is not a charm with at least "%1$s" uses left
create.item_attributes.implicit_number: is a gear item that has an implicit that adds at least "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.implicit_number.i: is not a gear item that has an implicit that adds at least "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.prefix_number: is a gear item that has a prefix that adds at least "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.prefix_number.inv: is not a gear item that has a prefix that adds at least "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.suffix_number: is a gear item that has a suffix that adds at least "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.suffix_number.inv: is not a gear item that has a suffix that adds at least "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.charm_affinity: is a charm that adds at least "%1$s" affinity
create.item_attributes.charm_affinity.in: is not a charm that adds at least "%1$s" affinity
create.item_attributes.trinket_uses: is a trinket with at least "%1$s" uses left
create.item_attributes.trinket_uses.inve: is not a trinket with at least "%1$s" uses left
create.item_attributes.charm_god: is a charm that adds affinity for "%1$s"
create.item_attributes.charm_god.inverte: is not a charm that adds affinity for "%1$s"
